CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 26, 1959, pg. 2, reads: "Neighbors Play Santa - The Neighborhood Friendly Club of the 2200 block Bedford Ave., in true spirit of donating something for others at Christmas time, prepared 25 large baskets of food for needy families at the home of Mrs. Cora Holmes and began distributing them, Tuesday... - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Adrent Allen and Constable Thomas J. "Tommy" Smith, standing behind brick patterned boxes of food, including celery and Drake bread, in home of Cora Holmes for food drive sponsored by the Neighborhood Friendly Club of 2200 block, Bedford Avenue, Hill District
